title: Animosity Gaming looking for members!
body:
Hello Everyone. Animosity is a gaming organisation currently looking for members to join as League of Legends players. We decided to make this push with the success we currently are having with the csgo team. We will provide everything you need from entry's to Flights and accomidation.
 We don't want to have to tell you guys what to do. So I am looking for players that are at a high skill level and knowledge about the competitive scene to play in this organisation. What your requirements need to be is as follows.

 - Mature is a big one. If you can not comply to follow rules of your captain or are toxic in game. Please do not bother.

 - Rank must be Diamond+ as we are looking to put you guys into OCS and further events.

 - Your IGN needs to be respectful

 - You need to have an open timetable for events and practice

 - Must speak English 

 - Must be able to have fun!

 We are currently looking for a:

 Mid Laner
 Top Laner
 Jungler
 ADC
 Support
Coach/Analyst

 If you meet all the above requirements Please reply to this thread with the following information:

 IGN:
 RANK:
 BIO:
 PREVIOUS LoL EXP:
 COMPETITIVE EXP:
 LOCATION:

 Thank you for your time in reading this. Hopefully you can join the squad one day  

 Kind Regards,
 Trouble

replies.body:
IGN: Dad Ganked Mum
RANK:PLat 4 
BIO:
PREVIOUS LoL EXP: diamond 5
COMPETITIVE EXP:none
LOCATION: central coast

Goodluck finding members!
When I get back to Diamond I might apply ;)
